ethnicities.name: Asian

ethnicities.name: Caucasian
ethnicities.description: People with origins from Europe, Western Asia, and parts of North Africa, characterized by diverse cultures and languages.

ethnicities.name: Hispanic/Latino
ethnicities.description: People with origins from Spanish-speaking countries, primarily in Latin America and Spain, sharing cultural and linguistic ties.

ethnicities.name: Pacific Islander
ethnicities.description: People with origins from the Pacific Islands, including a variety of unique cultures and languages.

ethnicities.name: South Asian

regions: Caribbean islands including Jamaica, Haiti, Trinidad and Tobago, Barbados, and others

ethnicities.name: Native American
ethnicities.description: Indigenous peoples of the Americas, with diverse tribes and cultures native to North, Central, and South America.

ethnicities.name: European
ethnicities.description: People with origins from the European continent, encompassing a wide range of ethnic groups, languages, and cultures.

ethnicities.name: Jewish
ethnicities.description: People who identify with the Jewish religion, culture, and ethnicity, sharing a common heritage and traditions.
regions: Worldwide, with significant populations in Israel, United States, and Europe

ethnicities.name: Romani
ethnicities.description: An ethnic group with origins in Northern India, traditionally known for a nomadic lifestyle and distinct cultural practices.

ethnicities.name: Mestizo
